title: Email Analytics API
description: Use the email analytics API to fetch events generated by marketing emails, such as sends, bounces, and clicks.

endpoint.description: API endpoint for fetching email analytics

method.description: HTTP method used for the request

appId.description: Only return events which correspond to the given HubSpot Application ID.

campaignId.description: Only return events from the given HubSpot Campaign ID.

recipient.description: Only return events related to the given recipient.

eventType.description: Only return events of the specified type (case-sensitive).

startTimestamp.description: Only return events which occurred at or after the given timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch).

endTimestamp.description: Only return events which occurred at or before the given timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch).

offset.description: An offset token returned by a previous call to this endpoint.

limit.description: The maximum number of events to return.

excludeFilteredEvents.description: Only return events that have not been filtered out due to customer filtering settings.

hasMore.description: Indicates if there are more events to retrieve.

offset.description: Offset token to use for the next request to retrieve more events.

appId.description: The ID of the HubSpot application associated with the event.

appName.description: The name of the HubSpot application associated with the event.

browser.description: Information about the browser used in the event.

created.description: The timestamp when the event was created (in milliseconds since epoch).

emailCampaignId.description: The ID of the email campaign associated with the event.

hmid.description: The HubSpot Marketing ID associated with the event.

id.description: The unique ID of the event.

location.description: Location information associated with the event.

portalId.description: The ID of the HubSpot portal associated with the event.

recipient.description: The email address of the recipient associated with the event.

type.description: The type of the event (e.g., OPEN, SENT, DELIVERED, etc.).

userAgent.description: The user agent string associated with the event.
